headerDisplay: Configure your lights in your [MiLight Hub](http://milight-hub.local)

host.title: Hostname
host.description: The hostname or IP address of the MiLight Hub

name.title: Log Name
name.description: The name of the platform as it appears in the homebridge log

httpUsername.title: Authorization: HTTP Username
httpUsername.description: Only needed if you are using username:password authentication for your MiLight Hub

httpPassword.title: Authorization: HTTP Password
httpPassword.description: Only needed if you are using username:password authentication for your MiLight Hub

backchannel.title: Backchannel enabled
backchannel.description: If enabled HomeKit will update if MiLight hub is controlled otherwise

darkMode.title: Mitigate bright flashing of lights
darkMode.description: A feature to mitigate the bright flashing of the lights if you turn them on with a low brightness value & to cache the last value before power off

darkModeOnModeChange.title: Mitigate bright flashing of lights during mode change (only relevant if RGB+CCT mode is enabled)
darkModeOnModeChange.description: A feature to mitigate the bright flashing of the lights if you cycle between RGB and Color Temperature mode

rgbcctMode.title: RGB+CCT mode enabled
rgbcctMode.description: Enables ColorTemperature characteristic which is unsupported by HomeKit in combination with RGB characteristics but gives you a more accurate control of your lights at the expense of not supporting favorite colors in Home App anymore.

forceHTTP.title: Force HTTP instead of MQTT
forceHTTP.description: Force use of HTTP regardless of MQTT settings in your MiLight hub

syncHubInterval.title: Hub synchronization interval
syncHubInterval.description: Defines the interval in seconds for synchronizing light lists with the hub

commandDelay.title: Command delay
commandDelay.description: How long to wait for HomeKit to send all values for one light (milliseconds)
